channel.title: I cant add a jail command
channel.description: Hi my source is a PI 317 im wondering if any of you got a working jail and unjail command if you got teamviewer or anything thats great mine gives me 21 errors in my compiler

item.title: I cant add a jail command
item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

Here’s my PI jail command.if(playerCommand.startsWith("jail") && c.playerRights >= 1) { try { String playerToBan = playerCommand.substring(5); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToBan)) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; c2.teleportToX = 3102; c2.teleportToY = 9516; c2.sendMessage("You have been jailed by @dre@"+c.playerName+""); c.sendMessage("Successfully Jailed "+c2.playerName+"."); } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }

And unjail: if(playerCommand.startsWith("unjail") && c.playerRights >= 1) { try { String playerToBan = playerCommand.substring(7); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToBan)) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; c2.teleportToX = 2956; c2.teleportToY = 3226; c2.sendMessage("You have been unjailed by @dre@"+c.playerName+""); c.sendMessage("Successfully unjailed "+c2.playerName+"."); } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }So just use these

Read full topic

item.title: I cant add a jail command
item.dc:creator: @xocean xocean
item.description:
@xocean wrote:

Simple

First let’s do Jail

[code=java] if (command.startsWith(“jail”) && playerRights > 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.toX = 2933;
        p.toY = 3285;
        p.action = 1;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been jailed by " + playerName);

yell(" “+playerName+” has jailed “+p.playerName+” ");
sM(“You have jailed “+p.playerName+”.”);
} else {
sM(“The name doesnt exist.”);
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sM(“Try entering a name you want to jail…”);
}
}[/code]

Secondly let’s do Unjail

if (command.startsWith("unjail") && playerRights >= 2) { try { String otherPName = command.substring(7); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if (otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.toX = 3003; p.toY = 3383; p.action = 0; p.sM("You have been unjailed by " + playerName); sM ("You have unjailed "+p.playerName+"."); checkDupe(); } else { sM("The name doesnt exist."); } } catch (Exception e) { sM("Try entering a name you want to unjail.."); } }

Read full topic
